notify.title: User Survey
notify.content:
Are you satisfied with this app? Whether you like it or not, your thoughts are welcome.
   Are you content with the price? Would you be willing to purchase it and recommend it to others?
   What are your thoughts on translation, design, advertising, or bugs?
   If you have any ideas, feel free to let us know. We'll make adjustments promptly until you're satisfied. Don't hesitate! Send an email to KeyMouseMob@gmail.com. Once your suggestion is adopted, you'll be immediately rewarded with a monthly membership.
